events.name: Crystal Palace at Brighton & Hove Albion

headlines.description: Jordan Ayew's late goal helped Crystal Palace claim a 1-0 win at Brighton, leaving the hosts without a Premier League win in 2020.
headlines.shortLinkText: Palace win derby to leave Brighton in trouble

headlines.description: Chelsea defender Marcos Alonso scored twice to rescue a point in a thrilling 2-2 draw against Bournemouth at the Vitality Stadium on Saturday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Alonso scores double in thrilling Chelsea draw

headlines.description: Newcastle United slumped to another goalless display in a draw against Burnley in the Premier League on Saturday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Newcastle goalless again in draw to Burnley

headlines.description: West Ham United climbed out of the Premier League relegation after an important 3-1 win over Southampton.
headlines.shortLinkText: West Ham boost survival hopes with win over Saints

headlines.description: Liverpool's unbeaten run in the Premier League came to a stunning end after losing 3-0 to relegation threatened Watford on Saturday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Liverpool shocked by Watford, unbeaten run ends
